!Adventurer Helper: I will repeat once again. You need to kill the Antelope Canyon, Enslaving Antelope Canyon, Dragon Canyon, Enslaved Dragon Canyon, the Eye of the Savior, a Bull of a Slave, the Eye of the Conductor, the Eye of the Nightmare, the Eye of the superintendent, the Homunculus, Grendel of a Slave, the Eye of the pilgrim, the Older of the Homunculus, the Eye of the Ruler and A Hellhound, collect the 45 Bloody Tears, and then take them Goddard Master Justin. Now it is time for You to move to the Wall of Argos. Do you understand that? Long live the trip!
